Articles.Content:
Long time lurker, playing since 0.14. Just wanted to make sure I can post albums correctly

Javascript is disabled. View full album
Welcome to KSP! We have snacks in the pantries:D
Welcome aboard! Those are some nice looking photos!
It actually loaded, this is amazing. Sadly these come from a save where a quicksave was loaded, and that quick save was when i was at teir 2 vs the teir 5 that was unlocked.
Welcome fellow Canadian! May we eat Beaver Tails and slurp on the finest Timmies mochas together whilst riding on mooses!

Another Canadian, eh? 0.14? I've been around playing KSP since 0.20, but never made a forum account until a year ago. I see that you've had an account for about 1.5 years, but KSP for much longer. Back on track, welcome to the KSP community!

Edited January 25, 2015 by NeatCrown
Hey! I'm a Michigander! I've been really considering moving to Canada once I'm done at school here. Think it's a good idea?

Welcome Lobe, some nice looking ships you have there, I've never been very good with spaceplanes. Sometimes I find I spend more time on the forums than in the game!

Zabre: basically wherever you find the best opportunities for yourself is where you want to be.

To Zabre, it really depends on where you want to go. For easy climate and prestige, try Southern Ontario or Vancouver they are warm and have little snow. If you can find Muskoka on Google maps, anything above that latitude is covered in snow 5months of the year (November-March) on a good year. However, go where ever you need to for education.
